import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Navigation from "../components/layout/Navigation"; import OtherPhotographerLisiting from "../components/reusable/OtherPhotographerLisiting"; import SearchBox from "../components/reusable/SearchBox"; import { chosen_photographers, categories } from "../utils/data"; import { GlobalContext } from "../context/GlobalState"; const Photographers = () => { const { photographers, searchPhotographer } = useContext(GlobalContext); useEffect(() => { if ( localStorage.hasOwnProperty("_search") && !_.isEmpty(JSON.parse(localStorage._search)) ) { const updated_search = JSON.parse(localStorage._search); searchPhotographer(updated_search); } return () => { // cleanup }; }, []); return ( <> {/* */}
